import React from 'react'; import './Science.css'; interface Product { name: string; description: string; keyIngredients: string[]; function: string; } interface CompetitorData { brand: string; seedOils: boolean; endocrineDisruptors: boolean; carcinogenLinks: boolean; microplastics: boolean; syntheticFragrance: boolean; positioning: string; } const Science: React.FC = () => { const products: Product[] = [ { name: "Hydrating Facial Cleanser", description: "A sophisticated, low-foaming milky cleanser designed to purify without stripping the skin's natural moisture barrier.", keyIngredients: [ "Cocamidopropyl Betaine - Gentle coconut-derived surfactant", "Squalane & Glycerin - High-quality humectants and emollients", "Betaine Salicylate - Gentle BHA for mild exfoliation", "Panthenol & Allantoin - Soothing agents that calm and heal" ], function: "Gently removes surface oils and impurities while delivering hydration" }, { name: "Face Moisturizer with Beef Tallow", description: "Lightweight, fast-absorbing moisturizer showcasing the unique blend of ancestral wisdom and modern science.", keyIngredients: [ "Beef Tallow - Biomimetic lipid profile rich in vitamins A, D, E, and K", "Ceramide NP - Skin-identical ceramide for barrier reinforcement", "Niacinamide - Multi-tasking powerhouse for oil regulation and pore appearance", "Comprehensive NMF Complex - Natural Moisturizing Factors for deep hydration" ], function: "Strengthens skin's protective barrier and provides balanced hydration" }, { name: "Caffeine Under Eye Cream", description: "Targeted AM treatment engineered to deliver both immediate and long-term results for the delicate eye area.", keyIngredients: [ "Caffeine - Vasoconstrictor that reduces fluid retention and puffiness", "SYN-AKE Peptide - Neuromodulating peptide that relaxes muscle contractions", "Argireline - 'Botox-like' peptide for expression line reduction", "Zerumbone - Potent antioxidant for brightening and protection" ], function: "Visibly reduces puffiness, brightens under-eye area, and smooths fine lines" } ]; const competitors: CompetitorData[] = [ { brand: "rawdog", seedOils: false, endocrineDisruptors: false, carcinogenLinks: false, microplastics: false, syntheticFragrance: false, positioning: "First and only seed oil-free skincare brand. Built for men. Built for performance. Built for long-term health." }, { brand: "Jack Black", seedOils: true, endocrineDisruptors: true, carcinogenLinks: true, microplastics: true, syntheticFragrance: true, positioning: "Premium-looking but ingredient-poor. Relies on synthetic shortcuts while claiming 'clean.'" }, { brand: "Cetaphil®", seedOils: true, endocrineDisruptors: true, carcinogenLinks: true, microplastics: true, syntheticFragrance: true, positioning: "'Derm-recommended', but built on cheap synthetics and low-bar safety claims." }, { brand: "Kiehl's", seedOils: true, endocrineDisruptors: true, carcinogenLinks: true, microplastics: true, syntheticFragrance: true, positioning: "Legacy apothecary brand masking outdated formulas with heritage marketing." }, { brand: "BRICKELL MEN'S PRODUCTS", seedOils: true, endocrineDisruptors: true, carcinogenLinks: true, microplastics: true, syntheticFragrance: true, positioning: "Natural-leaning image, but packed with essential oils, irritating synthetics, and seed oils." }, { brand: "hims", seedOils: true, endocrineDisruptors: true, carcinogenLinks: true, microplastics: true, syntheticFragrance: true, positioning: "Claims to lead men's health—formulates with PEGs, fillers, and synthetic fragrance." } ]; const exclusions = [ "NO FOREVER CHEMICALS", "NO MICROPLASTICS", "NO PEGS", "NO SILICONES", "NO SYNTHETIC FRAGRANCE", "NO SEED OILS", "NO PARABENS", "NO SULFATES", "NO HARSH PRESERVATIVES", "NO FILLERS", "NO DYES", "NO ENDOCRINE DISRUPTORS" ]; return (
{/* Hero Section */}

THE SCIENCE OF RAW POWER

Unleashing Your Skin's Raw Potential Through Biomimetic Technology

RAWDOG IS THE FIRST-EVER SEED OIL–FREE SKINCARE BRAND BUILT SPECIFICALLY FOR MEN—CLEAN, CLINICAL, AND DESIGNED PURELY FOR PERFORMANCE. WE FORMULATE FROM SCRATCH USING ONLY WHAT WORKS—AND NOTHING THAT DOESN'T.

{/* Raw Power Philosophy */}

Raw Power Philosophy

The core technology behind Rawdog is rooted in the principle of biomimicry—the science of creating formulations that imitate the skin's own biological structures and processes.

Instead of fighting against the skin with harsh chemicals or layering on occlusive, foreign substances, Rawdog provides the precise, recognizable building blocks the skin needs to function optimally.

Support & Repair

Provide skin-identical lipids (Tallow, Ceramides) to rebuild the barrier

Hydrate & Replenish

Use biomimetic humectants (NMF Complex) to restore moisture systems

Soothe & Regulate

Employ actives like Niacinamide to help skin balance oil production

Target & Smooth

Utilize advanced peptides that work with cellular communication pathways

[BIOMIMETIC TECHNOLOGY DIAGRAM]

Visual showing how biomimetic ingredients mirror skin's natural structure

{/* Non-Negotiable Exclusions */}

NON-NEGOTIABLE EXCLUSIONS

What's NOT in our products is just as important as what IS

{exclusions.map((exclusion, index) => (
✗

{exclusion}

))}

Every ingredient had to fight to be on our label. If it didn't serve a clear, proven function, it didn't make the cut. Every choice is backed by data and selected to support both skin and whole body health.

NO MEN'S BRAND HAS GONE THIS FAR.

{/* Hormone Disruption Focus */}

PROTECTING MALE HORMONAL HEALTH

We're particularly focused on eliminating endocrine disruptors and hormone-disrupting chemicals that can interfere with testosterone production and male hormonal balance.

Common skincare ingredients like synthetic fragrances, parabens, and certain preservatives have been linked to hormonal disruption in men. We refuse to compromise on this.

Why This Matters for Men:

  • Synthetic fragrances contain phthalates linked to reduced testosterone
  • Parabens can mimic estrogen and disrupt hormonal balance
  • Certain preservatives interfere with natural hormone production
  • Daily exposure through skincare compounds these effects over time
[DECLINING TESTOSTERONE LEVELS CHART]

Graph showing testosterone decline in men over the past 50 years, with correlation to increased chemical exposure

{/* Whole Body Health Risk Matrix */}

WHOLE BODY HEALTH RISK MATRIX

Rawdog is the only brand that eliminates seed oils, synthetic polymers, and systemic toxins—while using clinically validated actives, custom-built for men's skin.

BRAND
SEED OILS
ENDOCRINE DISRUPTORS
CARCINOGEN LINKS
MICROPLASTICS
SYNTHETIC FRAGRANCE
BRAND POSITIONING
{competitors.map((competitor, index) => (
{competitor.brand}
{competitor.seedOils ? '✓' : '✗'}
{competitor.endocrineDisruptors ? '✓' : '✗'}
{competitor.carcinogenLinks ? '✓' : '✗'}
{competitor.microplastics ? '✓' : '✗'}
{competitor.syntheticFragrance ? '✓' : '✗'}
{competitor.positioning}
))}
{/* Meet the Formulator */}

MEET THE FORMULATOR BEHIND THE PERFORMANCE

RAWDOG'S FORMULAS WERE ENGINEERED BY ONE OF THE SHARPEST MINDS IN MODERN SKINCARE CHEMISTRY.

[LIZZY SKELDING PROFESSIONAL PHOTO]

Professional headshot of formulator

LIZZY SKELDING

A physical chemist trained at Columbia University with deep expertise in intentional formulation design. She's built award-winning skincare products sold at CVS, Walmart, and featured in FabFitFun boxes.

As the founding chemist at Potion, she developed foundational logic for AI-assisted formulation. At Fig.1, she led end-to-end product development—from raw material vetting to strategic brand positioning.

Through her consultancy work, she helps brands like Rawdog craft not just standout formulas, but the strategy and story behind them—ensuring every product is as smart as it is effective.

{/* Product Science Breakdown */}

PRODUCT SCIENCE BREAKDOWN

Each product is engineered from scratch to embody the "Raw Power" philosophy

{products.map((product, index) => (
[{product.name.toUpperCase()} PRODUCT IMAGE]

High-quality product photography

{product.name}

{product.description}

Key Function:

{product.function}

Star Ingredients:

    {product.keyIngredients.map((ingredient, idx) => (
  • {ingredient}
    • ))}
))}
{/* Biomimetic Technology Deep Dive */}

BIOMIMETIC TECHNOLOGY

A prime example of this biomimetic technology is the use of beef tallow in our Face Moisturizer. The lipid profile of high-quality, purified tallow is remarkably similar to the composition of human sebum.

This includes a balanced ratio of saturated and unsaturated fatty acids, as well as cholesterol, which are all critical components of a healthy skin barrier.

Why This Matters:

  • Superior absorption - skin recognizes these lipids as its own
  • Enhanced barrier repair - patches up weaknesses naturally
  • Prevents transepidermal water loss (TEWL)
  • Restores skin resilience without irritation
[TALLOW VS HUMAN SEBUM COMPARISON CHART]

Scientific diagram showing lipid profile similarities

{/* Advanced Peptide Technology */}

ADVANCED PEPTIDE TECHNOLOGY

Highly targeted neuromodulating peptides that work with your body's existing biological pathways

SYN-AKE Peptide

A neuromodulating peptide that mimics a component of temple viper venom to relax muscle contractions, smoothing expression lines.

[SYN-AKE MECHANISM DIAGRAM]

Scientific illustration of peptide action

Argireline (Acetyl Hexapeptide-8)

Another "Botox-like" peptide that targets the neuromuscular pathway to reduce the depth of wrinkles caused by facial movements.

[ARGIRELINE MECHANISM DIAGRAM]

Scientific illustration of peptide action

{/* Product Development Methodology */}

OUR PRODUCT DEVELOPMENT METHODOLOGY

Performance First, Precision Always - How We Build Different

What Most Brands Do

  • Start with trendy marketing claims
  • Use pre-built stock formulas
  • Rely on supplier recommendations
  • "Fairy dust" actives at ineffective levels
  • Add more ingredients to fix texture issues

What Rawdog Does

  • Start with skin needs, not marketing
  • Build formulas from first principles
  • Every ingredient serves multiple purposes
  • Performance-driving actives at effective levels
  • Optimize existing ingredients before adding new ones

Ingredients in Formation

Rather than assembling a branded cocktail of actives, Rawdog groups ingredients by biological function. Each formulation delivers focused performance, rather than an unfocused mix of everything at once.

Antioxidants work in formation: A serum doesn't just spotlight Vitamin C—it's designed with its biochemical allies, ensuring comprehensive protection.
Barrier repair actives work in formation: Instead of sprinkling ineffective amounts of multiple ingredients, we combine a full system to reinforce the skin barrier.
Hydration works in formation: Beta-glucan and ferments don't just hydrate—they reinforce long-term skin function.
{/* Call to Action */}

UNLEASH YOUR SKIN'S RAW POTENTIAL

Experience the power of biomimetic technology and uncompromising purity. Your skin deserves nothing less than the cleanest, most effective skincare on the market.

); }; export default Science;
